attributes.action: Include electricity producing solar panels in the Green Homes Grant
attributes.additional_details: Add solar electric panel installation to the Grant and possibly home battery storage systems, for those who already have solar panels.
attributes.background: The Government Green Homes Grant has 2 goals reduce Carbon Production and boost the economy. Solar electric production at home would have a huge impact impact in reducing C02 production and would reduce the demands on the grid as more people move to electric cars, so should be included in the grant
